references.paper_title: Real-time traffic simulation with a microscopic model
references.reason: This paper is foundational for realistic traffic simulation, providing a baseline method for subsequent improvements.
This paper is significant for its introduction of a widely used traffic simulation tool, providing a practical foundation for various studies.

references.paper_title: Carla: An open urban driving simulator
references.reason: This paper introduced a widely adopted open-source driving simulator, enabling broader accessibility for autonomous driving research.

references.paper_title: Trafficgen: Learning to generate diverse and realistic traffic scenarios
references.reason: This paper presents a recent state-of-the-art method for generating controllable traffic scenarios, providing a benchmark for comparison in this field.

references.paper_title: Guided conditional diffusion for controllable traffic simulation
references.reason: This paper offers a novel approach to controllable traffic simulation, showcasing an alternative approach to trajectory generation.
